Reviews.Content: stayed comfort inn visit customers office march 2011 property situated pretty close bwi airport offers complimentary airport shuttle pickup drops round clock staff pretty cleanliness hotel hotel restaurant complimentary breakfast served missed waffles served comfort inns wireless internet pretty stable fast unlike hotels stayed travel lot conf lot seminars meetings conducted
